page.title: 19HOUSING
page.content: On occasions tenants forget their weekly payment but in general council tenants do pay their rent when due.Properties are vandalised but this varies from area to area.The waiting list in Warmsworth for homes for senior citizens is 6 yrs while families would have to wait 2 yrs.The hours of work vary to different employees while some officers work a few hours a week in their own time.There has been no slum clearance for several years and so not many houses have been knocked down. The council do not instal cavity wall insulation and the majority of tenants use solid fuel.Overall there is a wide range of accommodation to suit the variety of different households in Warmsworth.
